code: import'./About.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function About(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"ko-about",id:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"we are Ko-Tayt-Ki Kollektiv, London-NY-Miami-Tel-Aviv-based techno-art collective exploring perception, inception & conception. decentralised. fluid. we love code, LED & electronic music. doing multimedia art for purr-purr-purr :3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"we are artists, designers, architects, structural and software engineers. we\u2019ve already successfully hippy-trapped many burners in a few iterations of the installation created for Nowhere, Midburn and other regionals. we created sound camps, stages and parties within the burn community. our camp-community MoonCows does regular free art+music collaboration events and a yearly nano-burn festival"})]})});}export default About;
